message_1: Suppose you want to encrypt the message "MATHEMATICS IS FUN" using the Vigenere cipher with a keyword "CODE". Find the resulting ciphertext using the Vigenere encryption table.
message_2:
To encrypt the message "MATHEMATICS IS FUN" using the Vigenere cipher with the keyword "CODE", we first need to remove spaces and repeat the keyword to match the length of the message. The message and keyword will look like this:

Message:  MATHEMATICSISFUN
Keyword:  CODECODECODECOD
